short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This addon allows you to download all media content from the threads on 4chan and 2ch.hk
short.ru: Это дополнение позволяет скачивать весь медиаконтент из тредов на 4chan и 2ch.hk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to download all media content from the threads on 2ch.hk and 4chan. You can switch between all, image and video downloads, and download content that you haven't download yet
